Texts.Eng:
Fluffy, adorable, cosmic-attuned lagomorphic critters from a distant world of fantasy that have a pom-pom, bat-like wings, and a thing for saying "Kupo!". They typically are very skilled machinists, but they sometimes choose to become a knight or a mage instead.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Energy x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;10^reset;% Charisma & Speed
  +^green;20^reset;% Jump, Fall Damage x^green;0.5^reset;
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;30^reset;% Cosmic & Ice, +^green;20^reset;% Electric
  Tech: ^green;Glide^reset;
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Electrified, Mud

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Shortswords, Staves, and Wands: Damage x^green;1.05^reset;
  Pistols, Spears, and Daggers: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;1^reset;% Crit Chance
  Energy Weapons: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;10^reset;% Crit Damage

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  In low wind: +^green;15^reset;% Speed, +^green;25^reset;% Jump
  In high wind: +^green;20^reset;% Speed, +^green;30^reset;% Jump

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Terrible swimmers
  Health & Max Food x^red;0.8^reset;
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;40^reset;% Shadow, -^red;20^reset;% Fire & Physical
